评论详情: I am usually a medium. 36C. I ordered and returned the medium for a large which fits perfectly. Wonderful style. This will add sophistication to any outfit. The top seemed brand new.

I REALLY wanted to love this top.  Cute shoulder design.  However,  it is very fitted, and if you have any type of muffin top, it shows every detail.Sadly, I looked like an Easter egg in it. Not for me.

Some thing about this material that got a lot of attention! I wasn’t a fan at first, and wore it to the airport under an oversized cardigan. I got so many compliments. It’s now one of my favorite winter tops.

评论概述: Muy lindo y de buen material
评论详情: Queda hermoso! Me encanto y lo recomiendo
